  "Initiated By" : "FLORIDA DIVISION OF SECURITIES AND INVESTOR PROTECT*See FAQ #1*",
  "Allegations" : "ON 4-29-91, THE STATE OF FLORIDA ISSUED A REGISTRATION AGREEMENT AND FINAL ORDER IN THE MATTER OF ULRIC G. BROCK, (JR) AS AN ASSOCIATED PERSON OF R. B. WEBSTER INVESTMENTS, INC.",
  "Resolution" : "Consent",
  "SanctionDetails" : [ ],
  "Sanction Details" : "THE ORDER SERVES AS A FINAL ORDER GRANTING REGISTRATION TO BROCK PURSUANT TO A REGISTRATION AGREEMENT. THE AGREEMENT STIPULATES, BUT IS NOT LIMITED TO THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS: (1) BROCK AGREES NOT TO EXERCISE DISCRETIONARY AUTHORITY IN ANY CUSTOMER ACCOUNT; (2) BROCK AGREES THAT ALL NEW ACCOUNTS HE ACCEPTS OR HANDLES WILL BE APPROVED BY THE BRANCH MANAGER OR A PRINCIPAL OF R. B. WEBSTER DESIGNATED TO SUPERVISE BROCK'S SALES; (3) BROCK AGREES TO RECEIVE STRICT SUPERVISION IN HIS CAPACITY AS AN ASSOCIATED PERSON FROM A PERSON WHO IS PHYSICALLY PRESENT IN HIS OFFICE OF EMLPLOYMENT AND WHO IS LAWFULLY REGISTERED WITH THE DEPARTMENT AS A PRINCIPAL;(4) BROCK AGREES THAT HE WILL NOT ACT IN ANY PRINCIPAL, SUPERVISORY, OR MANAGERIAL CAPACITY WHILE EMPLOYED BY R. B. WEBSTER; AND (5) BROCK AGREES THAT HE SHALL NOT SELL ANY DESIGNATED SECURITIES.",
  "Broker Comment" : "THE STATE OF FL INITIALLY DENIED BROCKS REGISTRATION DUE TO 2 PENDING ACTIONS (SEE NO. 7 & OTHER DRPS ON FILE).  ON DECEMBER 4 1990 THE ILL. MATTER WAS SETTLED & ON FEB 19,1991 THE DISTRICT BUSINESS CONDUCT COMMITTEE DISMISSED COMPLAINT ATL-1201.  SUBSEQUENTLY FL AGREED TO REGISTER BROCK PURSUANT TO A REGISTRATION AGREEMENT."
